definition: clothing of a distinctive style or for a particular occasion, to put on special clothes to appear particularly appealing and attractive
details:
noun
- clothing of a distinctive style or for a particular occasion
= example: clothing of a distinctive style or for a particular occasion
= synonyms: dress
verb
- to put on special clothes to appear particularly appealing and attractive
= example: to put on special clothes to appear particularly appealing and attractive
= synonyms: get up, overdress, dress up, fig out, fig up, deck up, gussy up, fancy up, trick up, deck out, trick out, prink, rig out, tog up, tog out
